title: Fragile
overview: Fragile tells the story, in reverse, of two diametrically opposite families: the wealthy, influential Bachands and the middle-class, salt-of-the-earth Coutures. It's also the story of an unlikely friendship between Dominic Couture and FÃ©lix Bachand. The pair's mysterious death sends a shock wave through their families, exposing jealously guarded secrets, dangerous liaisons and hidden agendas.
